trans-unit.source: Version 2009-09-19
trans-unit.target: Version 2009-09-19

trans-unit.source: The 2009-09-19 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:
trans-unit.target: The 2009-09-19 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:

trans-unit.source: Enhancements to Shared Key authentication.
trans-unit.target: Enhancements to Shared Key authentication.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: The introduction of a new type of blob, the page blob, which is optimized for random read/write operations and provides the ability to write to a range of bytes in a blob.
trans-unit.target: The introduction of a new type of blob, the page blob, which is optimized for random read/write operations and provides the ability to write to a range of bytes in a blob.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="2de10e66-46cd-4bbe-98ec-aba34bf22c4d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Understanding Block Blobs and Page Blobs</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="2de10e66-46cd-4bbe-98ec-aba34bf22c4d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Understanding Block Blobs and Page Blobs</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: New naming rules for container, blob, and queue metadata.
trans-unit.target: New naming rules for container, blob, and queue metadata.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="d525950c-17ba-4b3b-9ed1-19a2145f769a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming Containers, Blobs, and Metadata</link> and <link xlink:href="1675a927-7eff-4385-a6a0-72f22d53c5e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming Queues and Metadata</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="d525950c-17ba-4b3b-9ed1-19a2145f769a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming Containers, Blobs, and Metadata</link> and <link xlink:href="1675a927-7eff-4385-a6a0-72f22d53c5e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming Queues and Metadata</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Blob snapshots, which are read-only versions of a blob as it existed at the time the snapshot was taken.
trans-unit.target: Blob snapshots, which are read-only versions of a blob as it existed at the time the snapshot was taken.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="f156bcbb-692c-496f-9c31-92a297896278" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Addressing Blob Service Resources</link> and <link xlink:href="64468b0e-315a-42ca-a090-e32e9bade1d7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Snapshot Blob</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="f156bcbb-692c-496f-9c31-92a297896278" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Addressing Blob Service Resources</link> and <link xlink:href="64468b0e-315a-42ca-a090-e32e9bade1d7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Snapshot Blob</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Blob leases, which ensure a one-minute exclusive write lock on a blob.
trans-unit.target: Blob leases, which ensure a one-minute exclusive write lock on a blob.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="68b74877-5678-46c1-bdbf-f6a68a73f75b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Lease Blob</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="68b74877-5678-46c1-bdbf-f6a68a73f75b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Lease Blob</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Enhanced control over publicly accessible container and blob resources.
trans-unit.target: Enhanced control over publicly accessible container and blob resources.

trans-unit.source: See <legacyLink xlink:href="1d1c1a78-7a01-4477-b8e0-394d122e15a6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Restrict Access to Containers and Blobs</legacyLink> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <legacyLink xlink:href="1d1c1a78-7a01-4477-b8e0-394d122e15a6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Restrict Access to Containers and Blobs</legacyLink> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Anonymous access to the root container.
trans-unit.target: Anonymous access to the root container.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="6ec9ec4e-1758-4515-92b4-a85d4f27cf05" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working with the Root Container</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="6ec9ec4e-1758-4515-92b4-a85d4f27cf05" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Working with the Root Container</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> response header, returned by all API operations.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> response header, returned by all API operations.

trans-unit.source: This header indicates which version of the API was used to make the request.
trans-unit.target: This header indicates which version of the API was used to make the request.

trans-unit.source: Additional options for enumerating containers, blobs, and queues.
trans-unit.target: Additional options for enumerating containers, blobs, and queues.

trans-unit.source: These options permit you to return metadata in the enumeration, and in the case of blobs, to return snapshots and uncommitted blobs in the list.
trans-unit.target: These options permit you to return metadata in the enumeration, and in the case of blobs, to return snapshots and uncommitted blobs in the list.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="1a1d2a8e-de2b-4fa8-9d6d-582998a26a4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Containers</link>, <link xlink:href="fa4760a6-5343-4aa1-b484-df823ce817e7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Blobs</link>, and <link xlink:href="c7f6a4d1-65e8-4375-974a-d04d6e934bae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Queues</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="1a1d2a8e-de2b-4fa8-9d6d-582998a26a4f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Containers</link>, <link xlink:href="fa4760a6-5343-4aa1-b484-df823ce817e7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Blobs</link>, and <link xlink:href="c7f6a4d1-65e8-4375-974a-d04d6e934bae" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Queues</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Additional blob properties, which save values specified for standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: Additional blob properties, which save values specified for standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="6e063a14-8ed5-4401-bd3b-ec3de4f7d74c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Properties</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="6e063a14-8ed5-4401-bd3b-ec3de4f7d74c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Properties</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: A <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>DequeueCount</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> property for messages, which indicates how many times a message has been dequeued.
trans-unit.target: A <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>DequeueCount</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> property for messages, which indicates how many times a message has been dequeued.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="d4c13c95-acaa-47ff-940e-f8038da44fad" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Messages</link> and <link xlink:href="d2d5151d-6bc1-4bd5-be13-d3eece4bdd57" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Peek Messages</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="d4c13c95-acaa-47ff-940e-f8038da44fad" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Messages</link> and <link xlink:href="d2d5151d-6bc1-4bd5-be13-d3eece4bdd57" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Peek Messages</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: A requirement that REST calls to the Table service include the <parameterReference>DataServiceVersion</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>MaxDataServiceVersion</parameterReference> headers on every request.
trans-unit.target: A requirement that REST calls to the Table service include the <parameterReference>DataServiceVersion</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>MaxDataServiceVersion</parameterReference> headers on every request.

trans-unit.source: New values are returned in the <parameterReference>Server</parameterReference> response header to identify the service that handled the request.
trans-unit.target: New values are returned in the <parameterReference>Server</parameterReference> response header to identify the service that handled the request.

trans-unit.source: These values are:
trans-unit.target: These values are:

trans-unit.source: Windows-Azure-Blob/1.0
trans-unit.target: Windows-Azure-Blob/1.0

trans-unit.source: Windows-Azure-Queue/1.0
trans-unit.target: Windows-Azure-Queue/1.0

trans-unit.source: Windows-Azure-Table/1.0
trans-unit.target: Windows-Azure-Table/1.0
